====
task
====

Indicates the root of the :doc:`task tree </programming/task_tree>` that owns this item. 

.. js:attribute:: task

**domain**: client 

**language**: javascript

**class** :doc:`AbstractItem </refs/client/abstractitem_api>`

Description
===========

Use task attribute to find the root of the :doc:`task tree </programming/task_tree>` 
of which the item is a member.
